response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This product, while valued at $800,000 to you, holds a special significance and potential for growth that could far exceed its cost. My proposal is to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential long-term benefits it can bring to you. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you require any further information or if we can discuss this further.", "product_price": 1200000}
